title: Studio sud
overview: Nico, Lisa and Chloe are brother and sisters. Their aunt absent, the three young adults share a villa located on the French Riviera. All are students of Studio Sud, the first European school of singing, dance and performance. The spectacle in the skin, they must be obstinate to try to get a role or make a model ... From the ground bar to the choreography sung, Lisa dominates the promotion, but must above all watch over his two cadets, between Nico the Don Juan and Chloe, nicknamed "Miss Potins". Caro, Sarah, Manu and Alex are their friends.
